feed.title: Little Grand Rapids - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Little Grand Rapids
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High 11. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
